question: Which of the following took up titles such as Satyasraya, Puru-ranaparakrama, Vallabha and Prithivi-Vallabha?
explanation: Kirtivarman I took up titles such as Satyasraya, Puru-ranaparakrama, Vallabha and Prithivi-Vallabha. He is also referred toÂ  as "the first maker of Vatapi." He ruled from c. 566 to 598 CE.
